title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the highest SOME LABEL 3805.0 among the 2 groups and in Safety glass, 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass out of all 8 Glass Types.
There is a gap of 3728.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 1999 in Glass Type Smart glass and Burglary resistant glass.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the highest SOME LABEL 3805.0 among the 2 groups and in Safety glass, 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass out of all 8 Glass Types.
There is a gap of 3728.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 1999 in Glass Type Smart glass and Burglary resistant glass.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
Among all the Glass Types, 1999 had the highest SOME LABEL 3805.0 in Glass Type Smart glass and lowest value 77.0 in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 1999 that was found in Glass Type Smart glass was 49.42 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Glass Type Burglary resistant glass.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 1999.
Averaging all 2 groups 1999, and 2019, the Glass Type Smart glass is the maximum SOME LABEL and Safety glass is the minimum SOME LABEL.
